EmailTemplate.subject: Join us at our Executive Testing Leadership Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thursday, Sept. 24th 2015, 09:00 a.m. - 12:15 p.m. CEST Eden au Lac, Zurich
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We would like to invite you to an exclusive Cognizant and Tricentis Event. Join us on Thursday, Sept. 24th 2015 for the Executive Testing Leadership Roadshow in Zurich.
Adept experts from Cognizant, UBS, Swiss Re and Tricentis will share their insights, best practices, experience and plans for the future on Test Automation.
Agenda:
Selecting the right tool(s) for test automation Robert Bonomo, Swiss Country Head of Quality Engineering & Assurance Practice, Cognizant
Selenium for Webapp testing Philipp Scherer, AVP, Senior Test Lead, Swiss Re
Effective Vendor and Customer Collaboration contributing to Testing Initiatives Success Anna-Maria Blengino, Director, UBS and Chris Cooper, Senior Manager, Cognizant
How do you achieve the highest sustainable rates of test automation? Franz Fuchsberger, Co-founder and CSO, Tricentis
Conclusion and Business Lunch
Date and Location: Thu, Sept. 24th 2015 09:00 a.m. – 12:15 p.m. CEST Hotel Eden au Lac Utoquai 45 www.edenaulac.ch
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/executive-testing-leadership-roadshow-2015-09-24?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
The Executive Testing Leadership Roadshow is an exclusive Cognizant and Tricentis event for executives and senior professionals only. Registration is upon invitation and capacity is limited.
We are looking forward to seeing you soon!
Best Regards, Your Tricentis Team
